articles.description:
Re 3⃣️如何抓住这样的金狗？  
一般我为这些 “永赚大师” 地址分3个流派：    
1、预知流： 不管他是认知高、有内幕消息、内部员工都属于这类，重点是它赚钱了。    
2、技术流： MEV 夹子机器人🤖， 捕捉全网的链上异动，由于“预知流”大额交易，必然导致流动性的突然波动， 所以紧随其后的就是夹子。…

articles.description:
Re @ngnl1049 try (goat) milk kefir with oats
Same amount of protein as milk, kefir eats all the lactose which is generally what people react to and kefir is the best probiotic you can possibly put in your body. 
Put oats & fruits & honey in kefir and keep it overnight for 2nd fermentation

articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
The German Government BKA (~German FBI) wallet sold ~6,5k $BTC in the last 6 hrs. 
It still holds 43k BTC, worth around $2.8 billion. 
The funds come from seizure of the Movie2k website operator
https://x.com/ArkhamIntel/status/1752761784639881396


Arkham: The German Government is now on Arkham.
The German Federal Criminal Police Office (BKA) seized almost 50,000 BTC ($2.12B) from the operators of http://Movie2k.to, a film piracy website that was active in 2013.
The BKA received the Bitcoin in mid-January after a ‘voluntary…
